text: Mr. Brown, passionate and warm-hearted, led Labour's attack on the higher health charges. Mr. Powell, white-faced and outwardly unemotional, replied with a statistical statement - and ended by inciting Labour MPs to angry uproar. One dealt with the human issue behind the Health Service; the other tried to show that the balance-sheet must always come first.
